attributes.action: Investigate Sky TV's monopoly - it is plainly uncompetitive to be able to control TV product rights and means of distribution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sky TV have a unique and uncompetitive monopoly on Pay TV in the UK.  The only competitors have to compete on inferior platforms with less coverage and with fewer channels.  Sky can dictate pricing, service terms and maintenance costs as a result. Failure to investigate this by any government must be gross dereliction of duty.

rejection.details: Please contact the Competition Commisssion http://www.competition-commission.org.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
